name: gibbered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
gibber
to speak quickly in a way that cannot be understood, usually when you are very frightened or confused: Stop gibbering, man, and tell us what you saw. Compare
gabble verb mainly UK
blabber informal
prattle verb
